posts.post_content:
Breaking up my partial set of T218s. Shipping is $1 PWE or $5 BMWP. Payment via paypal G&S. Offers will be considered. 

This is the somewhat tough card to find of Edward Payson Weston, the world champion of pedestrianism. This card is a Factory 649 (Mecca), no series listing. Card does have some creases but presents well, again, a tougher card to find. Pictures below.
